reviews.review: The science team screams their ass off when nothing is wrong.
La base du FPS de la fin des années 90. Et l'ambiance fonctionne toujour aussi bien !
Игра на движке от Half-Life 2 фиговая, не рекомендую, лишь можно погамать в обычный Half-Life. Но так рекомендую, если хотете.

[h1]Как это вообще можно продавать?[/h1]

Когда я купил игру, я думал, что это будет очень здорово, увидеть старую и любимую [b]Half-Life[/b] в новых красках. Я никогда так сильно не разочаровывался.
   Существует масса [strike]хороших[/strike] [u]замечательных[/u] модов! Которые просто пылятся в магазине и практически никем не играются. Это моды, которые со временем перестают обновляться разработчиками из-за своей фритуплейности и отсутствия финансовой поддержки. Так ответьте мне, какого чёрта [b]ЭТО[/b] стоит 200 рублей? Я думаю, что лучше было бы сделать эту игру в виде бесплатного мода, запускающегося только при наличии оригинальной версии [b]Half-Life.[/b]

[b][u]Что было добавлено / измененно в игру(е):[/u][/b]
- Физика трупов.
- Текстуры воды из HL2.
- Текстуры крови и следы от пуль из той же HL2.
- Некоторые звуки, опять же взятые из HL2.

[b][u]Вывод:[/u][/b] Берём [b]Half-Life[/b], добавляем крошечную щепотку [b]Half-Life 2[/b] и получаем [b]Half-Life: Source.[/b]

[b][u]Личная оценка:[/u][/b] 2/10 [i]Бессмысленная трата денег.[/i]

   Вот в прочем и всё. Игру я проходил довольно давно, а рекомендацию решил написать только сейчас, поэтому, возможно, я что-то забыл и не упомянул. Если вы со мной не согласны и решили что-то дополнить, то прошу написать это в комментариях под рекомендацией.

Определенно одна из лучших игр прошлого,актуальна даже сейчас.Играя просто восхищаешься атмосферой 1999-х годов.Графон для того времени весьма неплох.Советую поиграть тем,кто еще не приступил к изучению этой игры.

Good revamp of the original in source, although it's really not worth the buy unless you wish to prctically waste money on a game you may have played. If you haven't played the first Half-Life, this is in my opinion a superior release of the game.

10年程前のゲームのリメイクなのですが画質はだいぶ古いです（PS1かPS2初期程度）
ちょくちょくはさむロードでテンポが悪く操作性も決していいとはいえませんｗ
正直２がやりたくてまとめパック的な物を買ったらついてきたのでどうせならと思ってやっていますｗ
序盤の操作に慣れないうちにさせられるコンテナ間の飛び移りで投げかけました
インターフェイスは日本語ですが字幕などは出ない為ストーリーはなんとなく雰囲気で理解するしかありません
単品買いはやめた方がいいと思います
The updated version of the game that built Valve! There's really not much else to say. Amazing game!
Half Life is going to be forever in our hearts!
Efsanenin source motoruyla yapılmış hali. Oyuna özleminiz varsa kaçınılmaz bu halini oynayacaksınız. Diğer ilk hali büyüyen monitörlerin neticesinde artık oynnamaz duruma gelmiş.
Ten sam oryginalny Half-Life przeniesiony w wymiary silnika Source. Te same przygody Freemana. Tak samo wciągające jak kiedyś. Zachęcam do przekonania się osobiście.

Just play the original Half-Life with the HD pack enabled, or the free mod Black Mesa.
This version isn't worth your time.
Крутая игра для крутого поцана :) (или девченки)
Half-Life: Source
Slightly improved version of classic Half-Life (water, ragdolls, textures). If you want to start your Half-Life adventure it's a perfect place to start ;)

Игра копирует оригинальный Half-Life, однако, интеллект персонажей и отдельные элементы графики подняты на новый уровень. Версия для Linux, предположительно, имеет небольшой баг, проявление которого заключается в невозможности (может, только у меня) смены языка озвучания. При смене в игровом меню и подтверждении перезапуска игра закрывается, но оставляет свои процессы и не может запуститься повторно. После убийства процессов через диспетчер игра запускается, но язык остается прежним. Рекомендую, таки, играть в оригинальную версию, а если хочется на Source, есть Black Mesa - созданный энтузиастами римейк, как раз выглядящий как игра на Source.

Recomiendo mucho este juego, es una onbra maetra, casi nunca se encuentra un FPS en el que tengas que pensar y laborar estrategias para porder continuar el juego, ademas la historia y el tema es muy buena. Altamente recomendado
This game is one of the best games ever. Even 16 years after it's release, it's still very fun.

Half-Life is among the great landmark shooters and if you are a fan of science fiction or first person shooters you owe it to yourself to play this gem. Yes the graphics are dated, but that is to be expected from an old game. Half-Life: Source is just the original Half-Life ported over to the Source engine after all. 

Great game. Play it. Tell your friends. 

It is an old game as I have said so be mindful of older design conventions and judge accordingly.

9/10 - Just the legendary Half-Life with slightly improved graphics.
Get one or the other, but don't waste your cash on both (unless you get the Complete Valve Pack like I did)
greatest game of all time and it will always be my favorite.
Good

One of the best FPSs of all time. At some point in your life you must have heard about this game, or it sequel. Every game in the genre borrows some elements from this one, guaranteed. 

The arms you with a handful of weapons you mst make your way though a ridiculously big research facility overrun with aliens and military forces. A non stop action package with zero cutscenes.

The story is explained through small chats with the surviving members of the facility and paying attention to enemy  conversations. You can also gather some extra details by cautiously examining the environment.

All the enemy soldiers have an instantly recognizeable scruffy voice while the friendly NPCs sound more calmed and soft, for the most part. This game also has some os the most well known scores for PC games (like the Nuclear Mission jam), and the weapon sounds are very well made.

Although this is a remake of the original release for the source engine the graphics were not enhanced at all, so don't expect brilliant quality. Some users also say this version is inferior to the original because it added extra bugs and other issues, but I encountered none during my playthrough. Your mileage may vary though.

Overall, this game is a classic and a must play for anyone who enjoys videogames.
its alright. havent finnished it but it looks pretty good.

obviously this is a great game. its freaking half life for gods sake. but, the source version is incredibly glitchy and doesn't add much to the game. if you want to get half life, you should probably buy the original.

un autre point majeur est la détection du pad (XBOX 360) ce qui évite de passer par Xpadder pour configurer le jeu.
mis à part ceci le jeu reste identique a son ainée, le point négatif es qu'il es dommage qui n'ont pas inclus blue shift et opposing force en version source ce qui évite comme dit précedement d'utiliser xpadder pour configurer un pad que je trouve tout de même plus pratique que au clavier

Quite possibly one of the best FPS games I have EVER played. Even better than most modern shooters. Which is interesting, considering it's as old as I am.

Play this game, you will NEVER regret it. (If you DO regret it, then there is possibly something VERY wrong with you.)

This game is Amazing. It takes all that is good from the GoldSRC version of half-life, and translates it to the scource engine, adding ragdolls, better water and (slightly) improved graphics. Overall, it seamlessly merges half-life 1 with the scource engine and therefore, I strongly recommend it.
재미있긴하다 근데 길찾기 너무힘들고 무엇보다도 어려워서 암걸린다.

Şahsen Half Life 1 i defalarca oynayan biri olarak kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Grafiklerdeki iyileştirmeler oyunu 100 defa oynasanız bile tekrardan oynamanızı sağlayacaktır. Bedenlerden kanın çıkışı, duvardaki görüntüsü, su altı görüntüsü, fener ışığının cisimlerde oluşturduğu gölgelendirmesi vb. şahane bir zevk veriyor. Ayrıca her bölümü ayrı ayrı oynama imkanını veriyor oyuncuya. Örnek Blast Pit'i oynamaya bayılırım. Sadece istediğim bölümü seçmem yeterli.
Ммм... Пиксельные текстурки  :*)

Half-life:Source (Un Jugador)Un buen juego pero no se esperaba que tubiera las graficas de half-life 1.La historia es identica al juego original nada mas que con el motor source y no cambian muchas cosas.Las armas funcionan y dañan igual que el juego original exepto por algunas exepciones.Algo que me molesto de este juego es que no puedo derribar los helicopteros y los aerotrasportadores ya que las armas los transpasan.El daño que los NPC causan estan algo bien balanceados y otra cosa que me molesto fue que los aliens que solo se guian por el sonido ni siquiera te dañan no te hacen nada en absoluto solo si te quedas quieto y hablo de no hacer nada.Una ultima cosa que me molesto fue que en espacios muy angostos como tubos,etc,me quedaba atrapado y no podia moverme y tenia que volver a cargar la anterior escena (esto me ocurria cuando cambiaba de mapa). pero al menos es un buen juego que lo recomiendo para pasartelo.

Nt:Este juego tiene los Modelos HD del Half-Life:Blue Shift para hacerlo algo mas dinamico.

If you still have not played this game and intend to because you expect some greatness as what possibly hyped Half-Life 2 so much, you are going to find out that this is a huge waste of time, as I did. 

This game aged quite a lot, back when it was released it could be considered good due to having some puzzles, top-notch graphics, a different story, which is introduced with a lot of suspense but ends up simpler than when it began. 

But, if you have already read about it because you have already played Half-Life 2, you know everything you need to, and you would be very disappointed to find out that all the story details that made Half-Life 2 so great were not in fact introduced in Half-Life 1.

Skip this game and play something that is more worth your time.

A bug prevents me from progressing past one of the first doors encountered in the game. The nearby guard is supposed to open it after I grab the HEV suit and energy, but he never does.

At least I purchased this when it was 50% off so I'm only out half the cost of the game.
FFFFFFRRRRRRRREEEEEEEMMMMMMAAAAAAANNNNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I love it

Is it worth it if you already own the original? YES!!! Now, please, come ON people! Stop hating it because it is "the same as the original". I will tell you why it is BETTER than the original. 1. If you beat the game but forgot to save, this game allows you to go to ANY point in the game. 2. It is a nice love letter to those Half-Life 1 and exansion players. 3. Yes, it is the same game, BUT, Valve wants new players to go try the 1998 classic, with better lighting, physics, and just some better mechanics that Gold Source could not handle. BONUS FOR GMOD PLAYERS. 4. You can't use Gold Source models in the game without addons, so now you don't have to. So I give this game a 10 out of 10. So new players who haven't had a chance to try the original, hope you like it, and people hating the game because the reason stated before, hope you know see reason Valve made this game!

This is the quintessential FPS. A game changer in the world of games, every FPS player should play this, or the Black Mesa project (it looks pretty good, still waiting on the last couple of levels). 2 thumbs up
same thing as half life 1998. i dont understand the difference

Yeah, wow. When I finally got this years after release due to new PC that could handle games, I played only using quicksave until I jumped to the wrong place and could not get back! It was hard, because it was the wrong way!

Anyway, I have faint memories from several areas of the game, but never a continious run. Right now I'm playing through it in the DK2 to get the complete package. The Source version does polish up the original quite a bit, there are many HD models, water effects, shadows, modelled environments instead of cube-maps etc. I paid for this separately, and I'm happy I did.

As for playing in VR, of course it's awesome, but. Before doing this I've played 30h+ of HL2 in the DK1, 15h+ of the episodes in DK2, as well as a ton of other VR experiences. This game, HL1, is not for the person without VR legs if you want to play it with supreme immersion. You run super fast, close to the ground, haha. At first it was a bit crazy, but now nine hours later I'm very used to it, and I plan on finishing the entire thing in the DK2.

A classic I never experienced at the time, but I still remember seeing it when visiting a friend. I only had time to sit through the intro, the loader robot still amazed me, and the character models... THEY MOVE THEIR MOUTHS. And chromed helmets on the guards... amazing stuff guys.

В далеком 2001 году впервые сыграл в Half Life Blue shift. Игра мне не понравилась , но зато приятно удивил High definition pack- новые текстурки моделей и оружия, новые звуки для оружия ( особенно SPAS 12  и M 16 A 2- они начали стрелять так , как и должно стрелять настоящее оружие). Очень хотелось , чтобы и этот пак можно было ставить и на оригинал и Opposing force. Мое желание сбылось , и радости не было предела. Прошел по несколько раз подряд обе игры.
Когда же наконец вышла Халфа на движе второй части , я просто очумел!)) Игра мне очень понравилась) Появились физика моделей и детализированная вода. AI ботов тоже, кажется, улучшился.) 
P.S. эта игра являет собой маленький бонус для каждого фаната Half Life)

Half-Life to pierwsza strzelanka, w jaką grałem. Pamiętam te czasy: pierwszy, własny komputer, internet przez modem (i skrupulatne liczenie, ile mogę jeszcze surfować w necie, żeby za drogo nie było) no i ta niesamowicie klimatyczna gra. Teraz, kiedy przeportowano ją na nowy silnik, dalej trzyma poziom i budzi te same emocje, ale jest graficznie odświeżona i po prostu ładniejsza.

Za plus: 

+odświerzona grafika

+stary, dobry Half-Life.

Minusy: brak

Этот ремейк абсолютно не стоит внимания. Во первых: мне не понятен сам смысл "подобного" перевода на новый движок. Во вторых: добавление в игру дыр от пуль и "красивой воды" только ухудшает вливание в процес игры. 
Например: сражения с здоровенной рыбой. Разглядеть ее на поверхности воды было сложно. Поэтому спуск в воду был непредсказуемый. Никогда не было понятно нападут на тебя или нет, т.к. разглядеть было невозможно. А тут она прозрачная. Сразу можно напулять противнику.
В третьих: баги. 
В четвертых: есть места где убрали некоторые предметы.(например в заминированном лазером помещении. Там есть лифт. На нем должен был быть ящик. Если лифт поднимался вместе с ящиком..то он задевал лазер и помещение полностью взрывалось. Тут же этого ящика нет..тем самым упрощая задачу.
Итог: просто неоправданный труд. Как бонус к покупке Half-life 2(при старте продаж было такое предложение) вполне годится. Но как отдельная покупка - это просто лишняя трата денег. Лучше купить оригинал.
А если уже и хочется поиграть в качественный ремейк...то скачайте Black Mesa.
Very original game. Loved it. Classic.

against better judgement, i decided to purchase this game. the sound and physics in this are atrociously bad and the game is with no doubt, riddled with debilitating bugs, not the squishy kind. simple tasks that shouldn't be difficult become jarringly impossible because of the way your player moves in lightspeed mode, and the sounds... headsplitting. the graphics are goofy, but forgivable for its time, dont expect this "source" version to be much different from the original, if anything, it makes the game worse off. im a big fan of the half life universe and the only real thing i want out of this game is the story, and unless you're a fan of this original, source or not, i'd wait for a black mesa: source full release before i gave it a go, again. save your munnies.

By the time I picked this game up back in 2004 it was already a old game, but HL is single handedly responsible for me getting back into gaming, and switching from console to PC.

Back when I was a kid I always prayed that one day they would make a videogame that was like a virtual reality where you could move around a real enviornment and interact with objects. Prior to Half-Life I had only played Woffstein3D and doom for PC. Doom was great but it wasn't really interactive or very realistic. 

Half-Life was a dream come true and it will always be my favorite PC game of all time.



For all those youngling's out there who grew up with Call of Duty and the like, you probably won't like this game. The graphics are old now, and the pace is slow. However if your still relatively new to gaming then please do yourself a favor and try it. Hell it even has a training room for those who don't have experience controlling a character in first person.


The only difference between HL and HL source is that source has slightly improved lighting and textures in certain areas. Its worth getting over the stock version, but then again if you really want to experience the game as it came out back in 1998 then sure get the original.

While I can see why the game was so groundbraking back in 98 it just doesn't hold up well.

There are some good moments in there but for every good one there is one frustrating and two boring ones. 

Visually game doesn't look good. It is not a matter of old graphics but lack of atmosphere and artstyle. Areas look quite similar to each other for the most part.

Gameplay is just painful. Half-Life exists in this awkward spot between old-school shooters and new Modern Military Shooters. You move fast and have access to many weapons at once (they are quite a boring tough) but many of your enemies especially in the late game use attacts which can't be dodged. It gets really annoying really quickly. 

Also first person platforming. And movement. Gordon slides all the time. You will die repeatedly by falling off something.
Es el Half Life Original pero con mejor agua, sombras y con ragdoll en vez de animación en muerte... es decir, ya no podrás pulverizar a tus enemigos muertos :'(

Я прошёл только 2 или 3 главы на мой взгляд мне игра не понравилась

Почти все перснонажи говорят на английском языке хотя у меня выбран русский язык
Я думаю обыкновенный Half-Life лучше чем Half-Life Source
Покупайте простой Half-Life а не Source
графика стала хуже, анимация не изменилась, игра стала весить в 10 раз больше, зато теперь нормально работает фонарик и остаются красивые дырки от пуль!
Is a great movie
very amazing game, its just half-life 1 with better graphics. i so far have been loving this game.
you probably should play the original version

¿Qué puedo decir de este pedazo de juego que no se haya dicho hasta el momento? Pues diré lo obvio. Si no lo jugaste nunca, nos dudes en jugar a esta remasterización del Half Life original, un referente de los FPS clásicos. Excelente narrativa, dificultad media (salvo ciertas zonas donde los saltos imposibles y una que otra maldita escalera podrían darte alguno que otro dolor de cabeza), gráficos aceptables y muy buen rendimiento incluso en máquinas de hace 5 años o más. He leído muchos comentarios donde mencionan que esta versión está plagada de bugs. Será que soy muy afortunado, pero yo no me topado con ninguno. Creo que hace algún tiempo parcharon todos estos bugs y pues la verdad esta versión va como la seda, así que si aquellos comentarios te echaban para atrás, despreocúpate, el juego va perfecto. Nota final: 8.5/10

It's the original Half-Life, with less modding support, texture glitches, and improved water effects. If you already own the Goldsrc version of the game, the only reason to get Source would be out of curiousity during a sale. Otherwise, there aren't nearly enough additions to justify the additional purchase. Half-Life Deathmatch Source is fun...when you can find people to play it with, which isn't nearly enough. 
So, while it is as good as the original Half-Life, it is also nearly identical to it as well. You're better off buying the standard version, which is compatible with Opposing Force and Blue Shift, unlike Half-Life: Source.
This game is amazing, I would definitly recomend it.

I really have mixed feelings about this game. The story and concept is great, but the controls and movement are outrageous! I constantly fall in this because it is so slippery and sensitive. Maybe I should have bought the original half life 1.

まず前提としてHalf-Lifeは名作です。その上でこのSource版は無印版と比べてどうかと言いますと、一長一短です。悪い点は、このレビュー作成時点においては有志による日本語字幕化ができません。ですので初めてHalf-Lifeをプレイされる方は日本語化可能な無印版をおすすめします。良い点は、無印版は一昔前のPC向けにつくられたゲームなので最近のPCには最適化されておらず、それによる問題が起こる可能性がありますが、Source版ならそういうことが起こりにくいことです。具体的に言いますと、無印版では頻繁に発生してストレスになっていたエレベーターなどで動けなくなってしまうバグにSource版は遭遇せずにすみました。警備員などのNPCの動きも良くなってるように感じます。全体としてはすごくおすすめという感じではなく、無印版が好きならやってみてもいいんじゃないぐらいの感じでおすすめします。
没什么感觉，这游戏就是让你走地图，怪物政府军的对抗很少，一次通关至少3年不想碰着游戏

9.9/10

I'm gonna be honest. I am 19 and I never played this game until now and I am so glad I did. This game is fantastic in every way. It is so amazing such an old game can still impress me so much that some of the new games today feels bland and rather boring in comparison. The game is so challenging and sometime even frustrating and yet I still keep coming back. I tried and fail, and tried again until i finally finish the whole game and there is only one word to describe my feeling, GLORIOUS. Will definitely play Half Life 2 and hope that it will bring me even more surprise and torture as well. For those who never played this game, PLAY IT NOW. I don't care you buy it full price or on sale, just purchase it and you will have the greatest time of your life.

Ive been a steam user for 9 years, i loved the goldsource games, i even have the original WON version of Half-Life. I Love the Half-Life series and its mods. This game is not one of the games i love.

Sure it may look like the original half-life with uppgraded graphics. 

Sure it may "Feel" like the original Half-Life untill the bugs happen... 

When i reinstalled the game to see why i havent played this version of the game i finnaly rememberd..

This game has gamebreaking bugs, that will halt your progress. First of all, let me list down the issues i had when starting this game

If your steam is in any other language other than English, the main menu will say #clickeble menu ON EVERY OPTION. You will have to change the language on steam to English!

When playing, sometimes when you explore before "unforseen consequenses" be sure to pick up your suit before you talk to the guard or else, your save will be corrupted.

When in missile silo, where the tentacles are, resetting the power to the machine to later turn on the fuel, the hatch leading to the fuel will be permanently closed. For me there is no fix.

When the game needs the user to open up the console and cheat to get it working, then you know its wrong.

The game feels like it was halfassed. Every element in this game feels flawed compared to Half-Life (Goldsource). Where skripts to open doors will fail to load. Events wont happen. Buy Half-Life instead of this. I cant stress that enough..

Great Game

OMG!  I played it when it first came out and loved it.  Made me hooked for life.  Blue Shift, Opposing Force, 2, E1, E2, all of them.  Was bored, bought and d/l Source and... IDK if it is original bugs or new bugs but with out noclip I don't know how I'd get through some of the areas.  Oh, the vent is half an inch too short to just walk through but an inch too high off the ground to just crawl through.  

But still, enjoying the some what updated graphics and ragdoll physics.  Just started tonight and played through to Blast Pit before deciding it was time for bed.

But other than the few times I needed noclip, the game is as good as ever and makes me want to buy BS and OF and then move through HL2, E1, and E2 all over again on my next day off.  I would say get this game if you love the series but if are new, maybe stick to HL2?  Some will whine the graphics aren't amazing, and I do miss the gravity gun(Best gun in any game ever) but this classic is classic for a reason!

This review is postitive because the original game is really good. Honestly, is doesn't really change the graphics much. I mean sure, its got some better better HD models and lighting, but overall, it's mostly the same. So if you already have the first half life, I wouldn't buy this. Don't take it the wrong way, it's still awesome, but I'd get the 1998 half life over this.
